title: LD rubbish mountain centre service
text:
Ordered a product and arrived as expected. The product didn't fit, so emailed ahead to request a replacement size, and also denoted the invoice note as instructed for returns/replacements.
Received a refund, not as requested. Emails for clarification remain unanswered.
This is just a poor company to deal with, an internet outfit who do the bare minimum. If there is an option of another supplier - go with that.
I wouldn't buy from these guys again, I'd sooner pay more and get more.
